column6: Yangzhou Everbright Foreign Trading primarily manufactures caps as well as clothing and accessories. It was founded in 1999 and is based in Yangzhou, China.

Everest Textile manufactures and sells textile products. It engages in spinning, twisting, weaving, dyeing, finishing, printing, coating, and laminating yarns. The company offers eco material, technical fashion and causal, soft shell, stretch, air pass, multi-functional membrane, multi-functional fibre, protective fabric and medical material, and knitting fabrics. Its fabrics are used in sports, outdoor, city, casual, industrial materials, etc. Everest Textile was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Tainan, Taiwan.
column36: "We have to keep seeking overseas sites for new factories, as the fabric manufacturing process is quite labour-intensive." - company spokesperson.
